1.content: So which McKinley guy will shrink?
1.title: Who is it?

choices: Finn and Puck are still there
13.content: You had just won a football game and all the team were ecstatic. Whilst changing back into your clothes you realize that you are alone. Well, almost...
13.title: Sam

131.content:
"So, great outcome, huh!" you say, trying to overcome the awkward silence.
"Yeah it was. You were great; almost makes me regret drugging you." Finn says casually.
"What...?" you are bewildered.
"They should be kicking in about now."
"What did you do to me?" Just then, you began to feel odd. Not sick- but very dizzy. You pass out within five seconds; the last sound you here is Finn speaking.
"Oh, there we go!" When you wake up you still feel odd, but not dizzy anymore. You feel that something isn't right. It is only when you see a sneaker that you realize what has happened. The sneaker is huge: easily bigger than yourself. The sneaker moves and you figure out that it belongs to Finn. A giant teenager stood over you and laughed. He'd shrunken you. Instinctively, you try to escape. You run as far as you can towards the door and for a short time you begin to believe that you might escape but that feeling quickly passed. Finn laughed as he took one step towards you. That was all it took as suddenly the teen reaches down and scoops you in his hand. You are lifted sky high and when you arrive at the giant's face you almost throw up. "You're not getting away from me, runt." The giant states as he stares down at you- clutched in his hand.
"My name is Sam!" you yell out.
"No it's not, runt. You're no longer a person: you're a tiny, insignificant bug and should be treated as such. Speaking of which..."
131.title: Finn is still there

1311.content: "I was gonna wait till after I humiliated you for a while to eat you but what the heck; I'm a teenage footballer- I need all the protein I can get." The giant chuckles a bit as you are brought to his mouth. You beg and plead but it's no use: you're all his now. "Cya, dude" and with no explanation or apology, you are sucked like spaghetti into the awaiting trap. Whilst you are being swirled around the mouth, coated in the teen's saliva, you struggle with all your might to escape but resistance is futile. You are forced down the throat and into the stomach of the titan. Through his abs and the wall of his stomach you can hear Finn speaking to you again. "Mmm mmm mmm you were tasty little dude. Wish I could eat you again but oh well. Just think: you'll become part of me! You might become part of my abs, or even my butt! Rachel would love that. She's always spanking and groping it. It's a little weird but, hey, the ladies can't get enough! That would be a real honor, runt. Well, cya on the other side I guess!" You shudder, sit back and wait for your demise.
1311.title: Food for Finn

choices: Kurt, coming to retrieve his scarf
Finn, sneaking in some practice on a song to win back Rachel
Blaine, coming to see if Kurt was there
14.content: Will was alone in the choir, just after rehearsing a new song with the New Directions. He decided to hang back for a bit and get some marking done. He had marked about half the pile of Spanish homework when he began to feel a bit dizzy. "It's been a long day, I think I should go home and mark the rest tommorow..." Will said to himself. Packing his bag, he noticed the ceiling was getting further away and the floor closer. "Right, this is a sign I've really overworked myself! I'm so tired the world seems to be getting bigger..." Will said, walking out of the room. But by the time he was halfway out the room, he had shrunk to half an inch tall! "Oh god, I wasn't tired and imagining things - I've actually shrunk! How did this happen?" he gasped. Realising he'd be squashed if he stayed on the floor, he decided to climb up to a higher surface. But before he could do so, huge stomps made the floor quake. "It must be one of the glee club!" he gulped. Two huge feet came into view and Will looked up to see...
14.title: Will

choices: After rehearsal Finn Heads to the pool with will still stuck to his pec
After Rehearsal Finn Heads home with will still Stuck to his Pec
143.content: Finn pretty much doesn't notice will on the floor. Will starts to scream for Finn's attention but Finn doesn't hear him so will decides to climb Fin. Will starts climbing finn's shoe and makes it to his Shoulder but then Finn makes a sudden movement and will falls down finn's shirt and gets stuck between Finn's chest. Finn starts to practice the song that he will be performing with Rachel. The song had intense choreography evreytime Finn does a dance move Will is smushed between Finn's Pecs. Will tries to scream but Finn Can't hear him over the Music. Throughout the whole song Will is smushed between Finn's Pec's until he becomes Stuck To Finn's pec.
143.title: Finn, sneaking in some practice on a song to wi...

info.brief_description: What happens when a guy shrinks at McKinley?
info.description:
One day at McKinley high, one of the guys shrinks! But who?

Finn Hudson (Cory Monteith)
http://gleesucks.com/wp-content/uploads/2010/11/Fin-Underwear.png

Noah 'Puck' Puckerman (Mark Salling)
http://estergoldberg.typepad.com/.a/6a0105349ca980970c0133f50d20b8970b-500wi

Sam Evans (Chord Overstreet)
http://www.teen.com/wp-content/uploads/sam_glee-e1288213685524.jpg

Artie Abrhas (Kevin McHale)
http://images.wikia.com/glee/images/9/9f/Artie2.jpg

Will Shuester:
http://blogna.tv/wp-content/uploads/2010/10/will-glee.jpg

Kurt Hummel
http://seriesandtv.com/wp-content/uploads/2010/01/glee-spoiler-kurt-boyfriend-fo...

Mike Chang
http://www.daemonstv.com/wp-content/uploads/2010/08/glee_10-harry-green_1597dj_1...

Or even someone else?

Rules:
1. No female giants, but females can be briefly mentioned (e.g. Finn may be in Will's shoe while he's on a date with Holly, or Kurt may be in Puck's pocket while he hangs out with Mercedes).
2. No sex.
3. You can go away from McKinley, and feel free to introduce new characters (e.g. Kurt may go and see Blaine)

Aside from that, anything goes! Please add, and enjoy the story :)
